DOC.brief_title: Analyses Human Milk From Mother Delivering Small Gestational Age ( SGA ) Appropriate Gestational Age ( AGA ) Infants
DOC.detailed_description: This observational study characterize human milk mother deliver term SGA term AGA infant . This observational , exploratory , longitudinal ( birth 6 month postpartum ) , 4 parallel group , multi-centric study . Total 300 subject randomise study assume 20 % dropout , 240 subject enrol . The recruitment period study India 6 month . The Primary Objective study characterize quantify maternal milk composition mother adequately nourish nourished status deliver term Small Gestational Age ( SGA ) infant , compare adequately-nourished undernourished mother deliver term Appropriate Gestational Age ( AGA ) infant define Fenton growth chart 2013 . The secondary objective study is- 1 . Association maternal milk component dietary intake nourishment status mother . 2 . Associations maternal infant clinical parameter maternal milk nutrient . 3 . To explore analyze additional functional milk component , triacylglycerol , cholesterol , carotenoid , vitamin , microbiota , peptide profile , microRNA , cytokine , growth factor hormone . The subject enroll study signing Informed Consent Form delivery infant ( i.e . term AGA & term SGA ) within 72 hour . Total Duration study subject 24 week . Sponsor notify end study 90 day last subject last visit . Principal Investigator responsibility detect document AE SAE
DOC.criteria: 1 . All mother deliver term infant , either SGA AGA 2 . Mothers 18 40 year age inclusive , time enrolment 3 . Having decide predominantly breastfeed new bear baby least 6 month age 4 . Having permanent residence maximum distance 50km hospital/center investigation duration study able follow step study 5 . Willing provide inform consent accord requirement local regulation . 1 . Preterm delivery ( ≤ 36 week + 6 day complete ) gestational age ) 2 . Currently participate participate interventional clinical trial last 4 week prior begin study 3 . Having BMI ≥ 25.0 4 . Chewing tobacco , smoke drinking alcohol ( > 1 glass per day ) , consume illicit drug pregnancy or/and duration study 5 . Presenting disease medical condition might prevent breastfeed collect human milk sample breastfeed contraindicate 6 . Having diabetes gestational diabetes mellitus 7 . Presenting dietary problems/illnesses anorexia , bulimia celiac disease 8 . Subject unable comply study procedure unable come hospital study visit .
